mapper.select: select id, productName, productCode, amount, factorageCost,auditCost,manageCost, rate, dayNum, userLevel, isActivated, createdAt, createdBy, updatedAt, updateBy from qt_financial_product where id = #{value}
select id, productName, productCode, amount, factorageCost,auditCost,manageCost, rate, dayNum, userLevel, isActivated, createdAt, createdBy, updatedAt, updateBy from qt_financial_product
mapper.insert: insert into qt_financial_product (id, productName, productCode, amount, factorageCost, auditCost, manageCost, dayNum, userLevel, isActivated, createdAt, createdBy, updatedAt, updateBy) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{factorageCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{auditCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{manageCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{daynum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isActivated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateby,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, productName, productCode, amount, factorageCost,auditCost,manageCost, rate, dayNum, userLevel, isActivated, createdAt, createdBy, updatedAt, updateBy from qt_financial_product where id like '%${search}%' or productName like '%${search}%' or amount like '%${search}%' or auditCost like '%${search}%' or manageCost like '%${search}%' limit #{start},#{end}
select count(1) from qt_financial_product where id like '%${search}%' or productName like '%${search}%' or amount like '%${search}%' or auditCost like '%${search}%' or manageCost like '%${search}%'
